message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to counteroffer at $150 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $150. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $165.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counteroffer at $155 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $155. I'm willing to compromise a bit more and offer the product to you for $160.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $157 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $157. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $162.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $159 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $159. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $165.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $160 for the product.
